import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function IdeaDiscovery(){const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const tags=['ZebraAI','Agent','Nexus'];const trendingCategory={name:'Customer Experience',ideaCount:15};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Idea Discovery"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search ideas...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tags",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Tags:"})," ",tags.map((tag,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tag",children:tag},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"trending",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Trending Category:"})," ",trendingCategory.name," (",trendingCategory.ideaCount," ideas)"]})]});}export default IdeaDiscovery;
